title: Bug 115960 - Datetime values retrieved from table show different formats in dynamic text item and data/text item
OB: When retrieving datetime values from a table, the format displayed in a dynamic text item differs from the format displayed in a data/text item.
EB: Both the dynamic text item and the data/text item should display the same datetime format.
SR:
1. Input 'new Date()' as the content for three items.
2. Save and preview.

Expected result:
Both the dynamic text item and the data/text item should display the same datetime format.

Actual result:
The data/text item and the dynamic text item display different datetime formats.
